p: The fresh aerial parts of the wild plants Origanum onites L. and Satureja thymbra L. were collected from Symi island (SE Aegean, Greece) in summer 2018. The plant materials were authenticated by Associate Prof. Th. Constantinidis; Voucher specimens were deposited to a personal Herbarium of the Department of Pharmacognosy and Chemistry of Natural Products, School of Pharmacy, NKUA (Voucher Specimen Numbers: Tomou and Skaltsa 004/005).
